org.apache.hadoop.hbase

Class TestMetaTableAccessorNoCluster

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.hadoop.hbase.TestMetaTableAccessorNoCluster

  • public class TestMetaTableAccessorNoCluster
extends Object
    Test MetaTableAccessor but without spinning up a cluster. We mock regionserver back and forth (we do spin up a zk cluster).
